structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Issuance Of Certified Statements And Duplicate Certificates Of Registration

text.section: Certified statement of registration and any additional information.
Duplicate certificates of registration, upon satisfactory evidence that the original certificate has been lost or destroyed.

Duplicate certificates of registration issued under sections eighty-seven T to eighty-seven JJ; provided, however, that if the original certificate of registration issued under said sections has been lost or destroyed by fire, flood or hurricane, a duplicate certificate of registration may be issued for the unexpired term without fee.
